attributes.action: l theanine as a treatment for autism and adhd
attributes.additional_details:
I would like the goverment to recognize l theanine as a treatment for autism bipolar disorder and adhd .i would like the goverment to research this product for its effectiveness on the complete spectrum of all nurological disorddrs and to make it available based on all currently available research through the health care system.i would like the goverment to add this product to all food stuffs as an essential


 part of the daily diet once all related research has been completed to prove or disprove its effectiveness on the daily health of the common populations mental health.i would like the goverment to make l theanine common knowledge to the general population as a part of their daily mental health requirements as vitamin c is to orange juice.
